Text.Page:
I'm Elthim's assistant. He's taught me more in two years than I learned in my entire career at the Collegium Arcane.

I can't talk about the master's work. He made me swear an oath. Still, when it's unveiled, you'll be astounded!
My apologies but I musn't break my concentration. My master's work requires precise focus!

My magic will send you to Elthim. Protect him while he finishes his taskâ€”it could be the breakthrough we've waited for!

To ElthimGo to Elthim
